name: Corona Finder
technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Canvas, Face Api, GitHub, Netlify
overview: We need to wear masks during the corona time. So how about finding those who don't? Let's find them and warn them.

name: Warning Notes
technologies: Figma, ReactJs, Bootstrap, SCSS, GitHub, Netlify
overview: A nice project where you can write your important notes. You can now follow your shopping and daily work much more easily.

name: Perseverance
overview: It is a very nice website where you can find the latest up-to-date information about the space rocket Perseverance, which was sent to Mars by Nasa.

name: Wetterlage
technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, GitHub, Netlify, RESTful APIs
overview: A good site where you can find out the weather forecast wherever you live in the world.

name: Analog Uhr
overview: How would you like to keep track of your time in a digital clock prepared with JavaScript?

name: Fatih's Restaurant
overview: Are you hungry? Come on then take a look at our food menus.

name: Top List Movies
technologies: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, RESTful APIs, GitHub, Netlify
overview: Are you bored? How about checking out the movies? So you can spend a fun time with your family.

name: Servito
technologies: ReactJs, React-Bootstrap , Bootstrap, SCSS, Redux, NodeJs, MongoDB, ExpressJs, Mongoose, Github, Netlify, Figma
overview: A decent environment where you can dine with your friends or family. Don't forget to make your reservation online.
